description:
Short sleeve tees are best for afternoons around town, warm-weather hikes, walks to your favorite ice cream shop, and just plain relaxing. With its comfort-enhancing seam construction and Merino-poly blend fabric, our Moonlight Desert Graphic Short Sleeve Tee brings the softness and the charm. Plus, its desert graphic ups its looks game to the point you’re bound to get noticed. You could wear a plain tee. But why?

Although this tee was built on our Men’s regular fit design block, it is intended to be a Unisex item. For Men, please order your regular size. For Women, we recommend to size down one size from your standard size. If you prefer an oversized look, then we would recommend ordering your standard Women’s size.
name: Smartwool Moonlight Desert Graphic SS Tee - Unisex
